name: Sherman Poppen
bio: An engineer in Muskegon, Michigan, invented a toy for his daughters by fastening two skis together and attaching a rope to one end so he would have some control as they stood on the board and glided downhill.

name: Tom Sims
bio: Sims crafted a snowboard in his school shop class by gluing carpet to the top of a piece of wood and attaching aluminum sheeting to the bottom.[7] He produced commercial snowboards in the mid-70s.

name: Jon Roberts
bio: Welsh skateboard enthusiast. With his friend developed their own snowboards to use at their local dry ski slope in 1976.
slogan: You can even make your own snowboard!

name: Pete Matthews
bio: Welsh skateboard enthusiast. With his friend developed their own snowboards to use at their local dry ski slope in 1976
slogan: You can even make your own slope!
